DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety of gabapentin, as compared to placebo, in a potential over-the-counter population with reports of occasional sleeplessness
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety of Gabapentin in a Potential Over-the-Counter Population With Occasional Sleeplessness
DOC.criteria: Subjects >/= 12 years of age who reported occasional sleeplessness in month prior to screening Females who were pregnant or breastfeeding
